job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_details.full_text:
AI Software Engineer, IgniteTech (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of applications built on large language models (LLMs) and other generative AI technologies. Key responsibilities include creating autonomous support platforms using LLMs, integrating state-of-the-art AI like GPT-4 Vision, and building systems like customer-facing assistants. This aligns directly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems powered by generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs' directly refers to the development and adaptation of generative models for specific applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools' and 'creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process', which are core software development activities for user-facing applications.
The phrase 'creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process' describes the development of a user-facing application feature.
job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision' indicates working with and evaluating advanced generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows' shows an understanding of how AI technologies can be applied to business processes.
job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures' and 'ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality' points to operational aspects of deployed AI solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction' relates to the operational maintenance and support of AI systems in production.
job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality' highlights the alignment of AI efforts with business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
